text: Ronald William McIvor (born 23 March 1951) is a Scottish former footballer, who played for Bonnyrigg Rose Athletic, East Fife, Wigan Athletic and Preston Makedonia. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Edinburgh Category:Scottish footballers Category:Association football fullbacks Category:East Fife F.C. players Category:Wigan Athletic F.C. players Category:Scottish Football League players Category:English Football League players Category:Bonnyrigg Rose Athletic F.C. players Category:Preston Lions FC players
title: Ron McIvor
